name: Jump Jump Music: Beat Parkour
description:
Do you like EDM music? Do you like parkour?
Are you used to listening to songs while running?
Now, the new music parkour game,you can enjoy jumping and running in wonderful music.
The rhythmic EDM music
The exciting parkour
Best match!

How to play
1. Select different song level
2. Tap to play
3. Follow the beat of the music and just tap before hitting the obstacle
4. Jump up, or kneel down, over all obstacles
5. It's as simple as this, start enjoying a great music parkour!

Game features
1. Constantly updated electronic songs, constantly updated song levels
2. Colorful game screens and characters
3. Rhythmic parkour
4. Completely free, enjoy a music jump and run anytime, anywhere

Start music！Stick to the end！
